== Source organization ==
  * *aprofplot/*: a java GUI for displaying aprof log
  * *benchmark/*: tools used for aprof's benchmarks
    * *test/*: some simple programs with different behaviour (small sms, linear, quadratic, etc)
    * *dsp/*: main benchmark for aprof, run different graph algorithms
  * *valgrind/*: [http://valgrind.org/ valgrind code]
     * *aprof/*: source code of aprof
